column4: i've put a floppy in the floppy drive but can't see it anywhere. how do i access it?
sudo modprobe floppy to activate the floppy module. "sudo nano /etc/modules" and add "floppy" at the end to keep it activated.
partitions in fstab aren't mounted automatically by default. you need to add "auto" to the options column for each partition for that (options column is the one after "ext3")
